actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution appointing managers on the part of the House of Representatives to conduct the impeachment trial against Harry E. Claiborne.

summary.text: Appoints managers on the part of the House of Representatives to conduct the impeachment trial against Harry E. Claiborne, judge of the U.S. District Court for the District of Nevada.

titles.title: A resolution appointing managers on the part of the House of Representatives to conduct the impeachment trial against Harry E. Claiborne.
